org.apache.catalina.deploy
Class MessageDestination

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.catalina.deploy.MessageDestination
public final class MessageDestination
extends java.lang.Object

Representation of a message destination for a web application, as represented in a <message-destination> element in the deployment descriptor.

Since:
Tomcat 5.0
Version:
$Revision: 1.1 $ $Date: 2002/08/22 19:41:00 $
Author:
Craig R. McClanahan
